resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75486</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75486</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>8f7ef2f0-8c34-482d-98bf-c3637568c8d3#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Törpe fülesmaki</string>
            <string language="en">Pint-size galago</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pint-Größe Galago</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">galago de Pinte-taille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">galago do Pinta-tamanho</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">galago di Pinta-formato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Galago πίντα-μεγέθους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">galago de la Pinta-talla</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Törpe fülesmaki, a főemlősök közé tartozik. Fán lakó, éjszakai életmódú. Repülő rovarokat zsákmányol. Afrikában honos.</string>
            <string language="en">Pint-size galago belongs to the primates. Living on tree, nightly lifestyled. Captures flying insects. Native in Africa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  főemlősök,  méhlepényesek,  maki,  félmajom,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, the primates, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pint-Größe Galago gehört den Primas. 
Lebend auf Baum, lifestyled allabendlich. Sicherungen, die
Insekte fliegen. Eingeborener in Afrika.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le galago de Pinte-taille appartient aux primats.
Vivant sur l'arbre, lifestyled de nuit. Saisies volant des
insectes. Indigène en Afrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o galago do Pinta-tamanho pertence aos primatas. 
Vivendo na árvore, lifestyled nightly. Captações que 
voam insetos. Nativo em África.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il galago di Pinta-formato appartiene ai primati.
Vivendo sull'albero, lifestyled nightly. Bloccaggi che 
volano gli insetti. Nativo in Africa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το galago πίντα-μεγέθους ανήκει στους 
αρχιεπισκόπους. Ζωντανός στο δέντρο, κάθε βράδυ. 
Συλλαμβάνει τα ιπτάμενα έντομα. Ντόπιος στην Αφρική.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el galago de la Pinta-talla pertenece a los 
primates. Viviendo en árbol, lifestyled cada noche. 
Capturas que vuelan insectos. Natural en África.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, die Primas, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifères, les primats, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mamíferos, primatas, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammiferi, i primati, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θηλαστικά, οι αρχιεπίσκοποι, placentalia, lemur, 
lemur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamíferos, los primates, placentalia, lemur, lemur</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>75486</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
